title: Umi No Koe
lyrics: Sora no koe ga kikitaku te Kaze no koe ni mimi sumase Umi no koe ga shiritakute Kimi no koe wo sagashiteru . Aenai sou omou hodo ni Aitai ga ookiku natte yuku Kawa no tsubuyaki Yama no sasayaki Kimi no koe no you ni kanjirun da Me wo tojireba kikoetekuru Kimi no korokoro shita warai goe Koe ni daseba todokisou de Kyou mo utatteru Umi no koe ni nosete Sora no koe ga kikitaku te Kaze no koe ni mimi sumase Umi no koe ga shiritakute Kimi no koe wo sagashiteru        Tatoe boku ga ojiisan ni nattemo Koko de utatteru Kimi dake wo omotte Umi no koe yo Kaze no koe yo Sora no koe yo Taiyou no koe yo Kawa no koe yo Yama no koe yo Boku no koe wo nosete yuke
